Summary.name: Lucas Attia
Summary.title: PhD Candidate @ MIT
Summary.summary: A researcher with expertise in polymer materials, nanotechnology, molecular simulation, and machine learning.

work.name: Department of Chemical Engineering, Massachusetts Institute of Technology
work.summary: Reasearching fundamental questions related to hydrogel materials and developing technologies related to oral drug formulation,

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
